alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 10:58AM EST until March 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River from Rivervale to Williams. White River from Edwardsport to Hazleton. .Minor flooding is ongoing across western and southern Indiana. Flooding is expected to end early this weekend on the East Fork White, but persist on the lower White into early next week and lower Wabash through the middle of next week. Additional precipitation over the weekend is not expected to be enough to impact river levels. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Williams. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.4 feet, SR 450 immediately east of Williams floods. Locals use Ridge Road to travel to Bedford. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
